product_name: Red Label Natural Care Tea, 1kg: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: Red Label Natural Care Tea is always the best
reviews.review_body: Brooke Bond offers Natural Care Tea in two variants, one is 3 Roses Natural Care and other is Red Label Natural Care. 3 Roses variant is strong and Red Label variant gives color but not that much strong. Different people have different taste buds. For me Red Label Natural Care is more exciting. have a daily dose of Ashwaganda with this great product. It is fantastic to our health in many ways. We have to appreciate brooke bond of creating such a blend.  Always Amazon gives products at good price deal. Keep it up Amazon.

reviews.review_title: In two cups 3 spoons tea required
reviews.review_body: We like strong tea.but in two cups even two spoons of tea is not giving the color...have to add ginger bcz taste is not actually coming.

This flavour of red label is just mind blowing. I am using it daily. Please find my review belowPros:1. The flavour is really nice when you are having black tea. The colour is coming really nice.2. The flavour is really hard to get in local market. But it is always available in amazon also with a legitimate price. You can go for it anytimeCons:1. It is not a good option for milk tea.Packaging:1. Packaging is the best part of this 1 kg pack. Itâ€™s comes in a sealed pack.2. You do not need any other container to keep the tea after opening the pack.3. The sealed pack is enough to keep it for regular purpose the flavour will be intact.

I have tried almost all tea brands available in the market but no one can give better taste and flavor then Red Label Natural Care. Using this product for few years and many time I don't feel the need of ginger, cardamom or any other herb to put in tea when using it.

Problem is , the item supplied was not the same as asked for; as you also see, I wanted Red Label Nature Care 1 kg and not simple Red Label; and ironically, somehow due to descrepancy in acknowledging payment  for the item , double payment was made and two packets landed at my place! One item opened by nistake and naturally gifted to friends. The other packet in tact. I only request, if possible to replace one packet with Red Label Nature Care, and oblige.  Thanks

Great tea with goodness of herbs in it. Got it for 410 buck in a lightening deal. Recommend everyone to go for red label natural care tea instead of cheap and regular tea. You won't regret.Edited:- bought it again and also subscribe & save for every 2months.

A great choice for the tea lover like me. It has a great aroma and flavor with 5 Natural Ingredients - Cardamom, Ginger, Tulsi, Mulethi and Ashwagandha that enhance our immunity system. Though the amount of ginger and cardamom very less but overall it is a good tea. If you like ginger tea like me then add extra ginger. The 1kg package comes with zip lock that's a plus point for storage. Highly recommended, give a try!

reviews.review_title: Red Label in a better than before form
reviews.review_body: Since my parents have started having this tea with five pre-mixed ingredients they have stopped having all other teas. The taste and aroma of this cup is mesmerizing, as it gives a mix of flavors. Red label has and always been a trusted brand, with this version i would say there experiment was successful. Amazon pantry has made our generations life easy with all groceries available on a single click. A big thanks to you!
